General.Name: Hankook Furniture Co. Ltd
General.Description: Hankook Furniture Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells furniture in South Korea. The company offers beds, storage products, sofas, TV cabinets, small tables, display cabinets, dining tables, chairs, desks, drawers, book cabinets, lamps, and accessory products. under the Roche Bobois, Kartell, MDF ITALIA, Flou, GTV, Nicoline, Gealux, Norr11, Mattiazzi, Acerbis, and Korean furniture brands. It also exports its products. Hankook Furniture Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
